TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClientIDMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET 如何針對可在用戶端指令碼中存取的控制項產生 。

span.span: Specifies how ASP.NET generates the for a control that can be accessed in client script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用列舉型別，當您設定控制項的屬性。You use the enumeration when you set the property for a control. 值，您將指派給屬性會決定如何產生屬性。The value that you assign to the property determines how the property is generated. 值屬性會呈現為`id`中標記和它的屬性是您用來從用戶端指令碼中存取控制項的值。The value of the property is rendered as the `id` attribute in markup, and it is the value that you use to access the control from client script. 值，您將指派給屬性不會影響屬性的伺服器控制項，只有`id`相對應的 HTML 項目的屬性。The value that you assign to the property does not affect the property of the server control, only the `id` attribute of the corresponding HTML element. 預設值頁面是可預測。The default value of for a page is Predictable. 預設值控制項是繼承。The default value of for a control is Inherit. 因為控制項的預設值是繼承，所以預設產生的模式是可預測。Because the default for controls is Inherit, the default generation mode is Predictable. （不過，如果您使用 Visual Studio 將 Web 專案轉換成 ASP.NET 4 中，從較早版本時，Visual Studio 會自動將站台預設值為 AutoID Web.config 檔案中。）(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to AutoID in the Web.config file.) 您可以設定`ClientIDMode`網站設定網站的 Web.config 檔案中的項目中的所有頁面的值。You can set the `ClientIDMode` value for all pages in a Web site by setting the element in the site's Web.config file. 您可以設定`ClientIDMode`頁面指示詞中的值。You can set the `ClientIDMode` value for a page in the directive. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ASP.NET 網頁伺服器控制項識別](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下列範例所示中所包含的控制項控制項。The following example shows controls that are contained in a control. 上控制項中，屬性設定為可預測並屬性設定為`ProductID`。On the control, the property is set to Predictable and the property is set to `ProductID`. 從用戶端指令碼，您可以存取的特定執行個體根據`ProductID`您嘗試存取的執行個體的值。From client script, you can access a particular instance of a based on the `ProductID` value of the instance that you are trying to access. 這個範例會建立具有三個的 HTML`ProductIDLabel`控制項。This example creates HTML with three `ProductIDLabel` controls. 頁面執行時，控制項的識別碼會是下列之一：When the page runs, the IDs for the controls will be the following: - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_1` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_34` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_43` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項識別](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)

related.span: 如何： 從 JavaScript 識別碼的存取控制

span.span: How to: Access Controls from JavaScript by ID

related.span: 逐步解說： 建立資料繫結控制項您更輕鬆地從 JavaScript 存取

span.span: Walkthrough: Making Data-Bound Controls Easier to Access from JavaScript

related.span: 逐步解說： 將控制項設定為位於 Web 使用者控制項更輕鬆地從 JavaScript 存取

span.span: Walkthrough: Making Controls Located in Web User Controls Easier to Access From JavaScript

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode AutoID = int32(1)

summary.span: 值是透過串連每個父命名容器的 值與控制項的 值產生。

span.span: The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control.

summary.span: 在呈現控制項之多個執行個體的資料繫結情節中，遞增值會插入控制項之 值的前面。

span.span: In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value.

summary.span: 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。

span.span: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).

summary.span: 這是唯一可在比 ASP.NET 4 還舊的版本中使用的演算法。

span.span: This algorithm is the only one that was available in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Inherit = int32(0)

summary.span: 此控制項會繼承其 控制項的 設定。

span.span: The control inherits the setting of its control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Predictable = int32(2)

summary.span: 這個演算法用於資料繫結控制項中的控制項。

span.span: This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls.

summary.span: 值是透過串連父命名容器的 值與控制項的 值產生。

span.span: The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control.

summary.span: 如果控制項是資料繫結控制項，並且會產生多個資料列，則 屬性中指定之資料欄位的值會加入結尾處。

span.span: If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end.

summary.span: 針對 控制項，可以指定多個資料欄位。

span.span: For the control, multiple data fields can be specified.

summary.span: 如果 是空屬性，則會在結尾處加入序號，而不是資料欄位值。

span.span: If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data field value.

summary.span: 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。

span.span: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Static = int32(3)

summary.span: 值設定為 屬性的值。

span.span: The value is set to the value of the property.

summary.span: 如果控制項是命名容器，則對於其包含的所有控制項而言，會用來做為命名容器之階層架構的最上層。

span.span: If the control is a naming container, the control is used as the top of the hierarchy of naming containers for any controls that it contains.
